original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.42. Sanidassanattika, Upādinnattika🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa upādinnupādāniyassa🔽dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha, anantare samanantare🔽tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte cha, kamme āhāre indriye tīṇi, atthiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika upa ā dinna ttika  na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na upādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ anidassana appaṭighassa upādinnupādāniyassa  dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitte ārammaṇe cha anantare samanantare  tīṇi upanissaye purejāte cha kamme āhāre indriye tīṇi atthiyā cha pe avigate cha  na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na anupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: The reverse order of the law of conditionality, The Paṭṭhāna text with the Tikas

original: anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā🔽ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: anupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā 🔽ekavīsa pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa 🔽na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na anupādinna anupādāniyam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anupādinna anupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: A conditionally arisen, not-dealt-with, unformed element arises with a formed element as condition. (In brief.) In the case of cause, there are three … In the case of the unincluded, there are three.
